snippet: The Pentagon must make painful but necessary cuts in compensation.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the Pentagon must make painful but necessary cuts in compensation for military personnel as part of its effort to satisfy mandatory budget restrictions known as the sequester; contends that no budget account can be immune from reductions and reforms when programs across the government are being slashed.
